ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie on list - finally found a Bard list with some lfe to it!
ygData.msgSnippet: Recently?  How about last weekend..  I was kind of pissed - everytime I ve been in KC - Hand/Warlord was cnsidered a linked camp.  Was camping the Hand room
ygData.messageBody:
Recently? How about last weekend.. I was kind of pissed - everytime I've
been in KC - Hand/Warlord was cnsidered a linked camp. Was camping the Hand
room and another group moved in on the Warlord Room. The first drop after
they took it a Harmonic Dagger dropped.

Two zones for Armor drops - (assuming you have Velious) - Skyshrine (but you
have to take Dragon hits). Better AC and better bonuses than Lambent. And
most are no-drop - so they aren't farmed for trading.

Another option is to try to get Frosted Velium from Icewell Keep. You need
like a 60 puller if you fight them - (they resist almost everything under
the sun) - and most people don't want to go anti-Dorf - but if you happen to
see a gooup fighting there - you may want to stick around and ask them for
the drops (I believe they are no drop as well)

Slyde Katzenjammer
54 Bard Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: John Grady [mailto:john_grady@...]
Sent: Friday, April 06, 2001 1:58 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Newbie on list - finally found a Bard list with some
lfe to it!


Instruments: MM Drums (finishing tambourine now), Gypsy Lute, Minotaur
Horn

Btw, I'm done trying for the Harmony dagger in KC. No one I've talked to
has seen one drop in a long time on Xegony.

Thanks for your input,

Tzeetch
51st Ministrel
Xegony Server
